titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Croatia
Croatia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Archives and Archival Institutions Act stipulates that documents are generally made available 30 years after creation, though diplomatic records may be held for 50 years after creation.

div.head: Location
div.p: Croatian State Archives: Marulić square 21, 10 000 Zagreb, Croatia.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and European Integration: Trg N. Š. Zrinskog 7 -8, 10000 Zagreb, Croatia

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers are advised to write to the State Archives prior to visiting to inquire about access to relevant records.

div.head: Published Documents
div.p: While there is no systematic publication of Foreign Ministry records, the Croatian State Archives occasionally publishes thematic volumes of documents.
